name: I am the bravest!
description:
This small game was made alongside the "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1" with the Theme: "This is not real". 

It was created by DynamoTom and BeastyRiot.

We did not put it in the competition, but still wanted to release it to go through the full process.

Get your phone ready! It is time to enter the spooky house to prove you are the bravest.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys

Flashlight:  hit Space while moving

Credits:

Art: DynamoTom

Programming: BeastyRiot

Engine: Godot Engine

Sounds: 

https://imphenzia.itch.io/universal-sound-fx

https://pixabay.com
